creator: Various
description: LibriVox recording of Short Story Collection Vol. 062. Read in English by Son of the Exiles; Bellona Times; Garth Burton; Mike Pelton; Tony Addison; Pamela Nagami; Craig Campbell; Paul Rizik; Michele Fry; Lisa Reichert; John Burlinson; BettyB. LibriVox readers bring you 20 short works of fiction in the public domain. This collection includes stories by a variety of authors, including George Gissing, Algernon Blackwood, Robert Louis Stevenson, Rudyard Kipling and Anton Chekhov. For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B Audiobook (253MB)
subject: librivox; audiobooks;
title: Short Story Collection Vol. 062
